issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1. Create an app & replace the app.js with the app.js for analytics test in feature test repo
2. Follow the instructions for rightscale from this wiki page: https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Analytics+Test+Plan
3. Build & run the app on BB device
4. Now generate the events using the app
5. Close the app
6. Launch the app

Actual Result:
1. We get ti.foreground event along with ti.start

Expected Result:
1. We should only get ti.start event on app start
fields.summary: BlackBerry : Launching the app gives us Ti.foreground event along with the ti.start event
fields.environment:
Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.1.201305150313
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.1.v20130521132036
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 
Win 8 
Z10 device running 10.0.10.88

comments.body:
Verified the fix & we do not see a foreground along with a start event on app startup
Thus closing.
